languages.text: {n}Махарий молча взирает на вас со смесью негодования и облегчения во взгляде.{/n} "У Вольного Торговца есть более важные дела, чем письма {mf|его|ее} подданых, Регина".
{n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий молча взирает на вас со смесью негодования и облегчения во взгляде.{/n} "У Вольного Торговца есть более важные дела, чем письма {mf|его|ее} подданых, Регина".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

{n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."
{n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

languages.text: {n}Sans rien dire, Macharius vous lance un regard mêlant indignation et soulagement.{/n} « {mf|Le|La} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a mieux à faire que lire le courrier de ses sujets, Régina. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans rien dire, Macharius vous lance un regard mêlant indignation et soulagement.{/n} « {mf|Le|La} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} a mieux à faire que lire le courrier de ses sujets, Régina. »

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯默默地看着你，目光中既有恼怒，又有宽慰。{/n}“比起阅读臣民的来信，行商浪人还有更重要的事情要做，蕾吉娜。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯默默地看着你，目光中既有恼怒，又有宽慰。{/n}“比起阅读臣民的来信，行商浪人还有更重要的事情要做，蕾吉娜。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius blickt dich stumm an, mit einer Mischung aus Entrüstung und Erleichterung im Blick.{/n} "{mf|Der Freihändler hat Besseres zu tun, als Briefe von seinen|Die Freihändlerin hat Besseres zu tun, als Briefe von ihren} Untertanen zu lesen, Regina."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius blickt dich stimm an, mit einer Mischung aus Entrüstung und Erleichterung im Blick.{/n} "{mf|Der Freihändler hat Besseres zu tun, als Briefe von seinen|Die Freihändlerin hat Besseres zu tun, als Briefe von ihren} Untertanen zu lesen, Regina."

languages.text: {n}Macharius te observa en silencio con una mirada de indignación y alivio.{/n} «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene mejores cosas que hacer que leer las cartas de sus súbditos, Regina».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius te observa en silencio con una mirada de indignación y alivio.{/n} «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente tiene mejores cosas que hacer que leer las cartas de sus súbditos, Regina».

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは、怒りと安堵が混じったような目で静かにこちらを見る。{/n}「自由開拓者様には、臣民からの手紙を読むよりもやるべきことがあるのだ、レジーナ」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは、怒りと安堵が混じったような目で静かにこちらを見る。{/n}「自由開拓者様には、臣民からの手紙を読むよりもやるべきことがあるのだ、レジーナ」

languages.text: {n}Macharius sana bakınca gözlerinden hem öfkesi okunuyor hem de içinin rahatladığı görülüyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in, kullarından gelen mektupları okumaktan daha önemli işleri var Regina."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius looks at you silently with a mixture of indignation and relief in his eyes.{/n} "The Rogue Trader has better things to do than read letters from {mf|his|her} subjects, Regina."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius sana bakınca gözlerinden hem öfke hem de iç rahatlaması okunuyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir'in, kullarından gelen mektupları okumaktan daha önemli işleri var Regina."
